explains: n. 搅拌器；[纸] 打浆机；助猎者
wordGroup: egg beater 打蛋器；鸡蛋搅拌器

sentences.en: Whisk the batter with a wire whisk or hand beater until it is smooth and light.
sentences.cn: 用搅拌器搅拌糊状物直到糊状物变得光滑酥松。

sentences.en: Sucre reluctantly takes the egg beater and begins to drill.
sentences.cn: Sucre不情愿地拿着搅蛋器开始钻洞。

sentences.en: A fast-growing industry in which Britain is a world beater: what could go wrong?
sentences.cn: 在快速增长的工业领域，英国是佼佼者：他会存在问题吗？
